sql.query: select lookup_type , lookup_code , Meaning Adj_CREATION_TYPE , Description as Adj_Creation_Desc from AR_Lookups where LOOKUP_TYPE = 'ADJUSTMENT_CREATION_TYPE'
select lookup_type, lookup_code , Meaning as Adj_TYPE , DESCRIPTION as Adj_TYPE_Desc from AR_Lookups where lookup_type = 'ADJUSTMENT_TYPE'

SELECT ADJUSTMENT_ID , ADJUSTMENT_Number , LAST_UPDATE_DATE , CREATION_DATE , AMOUNT , APPLY_DATE , GL_DATE , SET_OF_BOOKS_ID , CODE_COMBINATION_ID , TYPE CODE_ADJ_TYPE , ADJUSTMENT_TYPE CODE_ADJ_CREATION_TYPE , STATUS ,LINE_ADJUSTED ,FREIGHT_ADJUSTED ,TAX_ADJUSTED ,RECEIVABLES_CHARGES_ADJUSTED ,CHARGEBACK_CUSTOMER_TRX_ID ,CUSTOMER_TRX_ID ,CUSTOMER_TRX_LINE_ID ,SUBSEQUENT_TRX_ID ,PAYMENT_SCHEDULE_ID ,RECEIVABLES_TRX_ID ,DISTRIBUTION_SET_ID ,GL_POSTED_DATE ,COMMENTS ,REASON_CODE ,ACCTD_AMOUNT ,ORG_ID ,ADJ_TAX_ACCT_RULE ,INTEREST_HEADER_ID ,INTEREST_LINE_ID FROM AR_ADJUSTMENTS_ALL
sql.queryUpdate: SELECT ADJUSTMENT_ID , ADJUSTMENT_Number , LAST_UPDATE_DATE , CREATION_DATE , AMOUNT , APPLY_DATE , GL_DATE , SET_OF_BOOKS_ID , CODE_COMBINATION_ID , TYPE CODE_ADJ_TYPE , ADJUSTMENT_TYPE CODE_ADJ_CREATION_TYPE , STATUS ,LINE_ADJUSTED ,FREIGHT_ADJUSTED ,TAX_ADJUSTED ,RECEIVABLES_CHARGES_ADJUSTED ,CHARGEBACK_CUSTOMER_TRX_ID ,CUSTOMER_TRX_ID ,CUSTOMER_TRX_LINE_ID ,SUBSEQUENT_TRX_ID ,PAYMENT_SCHEDULE_ID ,RECEIVABLES_TRX_ID ,DISTRIBUTION_SET_ID ,GL_POSTED_DATE ,COMMENTS ,REASON_CODE ,ACCTD_AMOUNT ,ORG_ID ,ADJ_TAX_ACCT_RULE ,INTEREST_HEADER_ID ,INTEREST_LINE_ID FROM AR_ADJUSTMENTS_ALL where LAST_UPDATE_DATE > ? -10

sql.query: WITH ou_ledger AS (select L.LEDGER_ID , L.CHART_OF_ACCOUNTS_ID , L.ACCOUNTED_PERIOD_TYPE , L.PERIOD_SET_NAME , O.ORGANIZATION_ID from HR_ORGANIZATION_INFORMATION O INNER JOIN GL_LEDGERS L ON TO_NUMBER(O.ORG_INFORMATION3) = L.LEDGER_ID AND TRANSLATE(O.ORG_INFORMATION3, '0123456789','') IS NULL and O.ORG_INFORMATION_CONTEXT = 'Operating Unit Information' ) SELECT PAYMENT_SCHEDULE_ID, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY , CREATION_DATE, CREATED_BY, DUE_DATE, AMount_DUE_ORIGINAL, AMOUNT_DUE_REMAINING, Number_OF_DUE_DATES, STATUS, INVOICE_CURRENCY_CODE, CLASS, CUSTOMER_ID, CUST_TRX_TYPE_ID, CUSTOMER_SITE_USE_ID, CUSTOMER_TRX_ID, CASH_RECEIPT_ID, ASSOCIATED_CASH_RECEIPT_ID, TERM_ID, TERMS_SEQUENCE_NUMBER, GL_DATE_CLOSED, ACTUAL_DATE_CLOSED, AMOUNT_LINE_ITEMS_ORIGINAL, AMOUNT_LINE_ITEMS_REMAINING , AMOUNT_APPLIED, AMOUNT_ADJUSTED, AMOUNT_IN_DISPUTE, AMOUNT_CREDITED, RECEIVABLES_CHARGES_REMAINING, RECEIVABLES_CHARGES_CHARGED , FREIGHT_ORIGINAL, FREIGHT_REMAINING, TAX_ORIGINAL, TAX_REMAINING, EXCHANGE_RATE_TYPE, EXCHANGE_DATE, EXCHANGE_RATE, TRX_NUMBER, TRX_DATE, GL_DATE, ACCTD_AMOUNT_DUE_REMAINING, PROGRAM_APPLICATION_ID, PROGRAM_ID, PROGRAM_UPDATE_DATE, REQUEST_ID, ORG_ID, COLLECTOR_LAST, DISCOUNT_DATE, TO_CHAR(due_date) AS due_date_string, ou_ledger.LEDGER_ID L_LEDGER_ID, ou_ledger.CHART_OF_ACCOUNTS_ID L_CHART_OF_ACCOUNTS_ID, ou_ledger.ACCOUNTED_PERIOD_TYPE L_PERIOD_TYPE, ou_ledger.PERIOD_SET_NAME L_PERIOD_SET_NAME FROM AR_PAYMENT_SCHEDULES_ALL INNER JOIN ou_ledger ON AR_PAYMENT_SCHEDULES_ALL.ORG_ID = ou_ledger.ORGANIZATION_ID
sql.queryUpdate: WITH ou_ledger AS (select L.LEDGER_ID , L.CHART_OF_ACCOUNTS_ID , L.ACCOUNTED_PERIOD_TYPE , L.PERIOD_SET_NAME , O.ORGANIZATION_ID from HR_ORGANIZATION_INFORMATION O INNER JOIN GL_LEDGERS L ON TO_NUMBER(O.ORG_INFORMATION3) = L.LEDGER_ID AND TRANSLATE(O.ORG_INFORMATION3, '0123456789','') IS NULL and O.ORG_INFORMATION_CONTEXT = 'Operating Unit Information' ) SELECT PAYMENT_SCHEDULE_ID, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY , CREATION_DATE, CREATED_BY, DUE_DATE, AMount_DUE_ORIGINAL, AMOUNT_DUE_REMAINING, Number_OF_DUE_DATES, STATUS, INVOICE_CURRENCY_CODE, CLASS, CUSTOMER_ID, CUST_TRX_TYPE_ID, CUSTOMER_SITE_USE_ID, CUSTOMER_TRX_ID, CASH_RECEIPT_ID, ASSOCIATED_CASH_RECEIPT_ID, TERM_ID, TERMS_SEQUENCE_NUMBER, GL_DATE_CLOSED, ACTUAL_DATE_CLOSED, AMOUNT_LINE_ITEMS_ORIGINAL, AMOUNT_LINE_ITEMS_REMAINING , AMOUNT_APPLIED, AMOUNT_ADJUSTED, AMOUNT_IN_DISPUTE, AMOUNT_CREDITED, RECEIVABLES_CHARGES_REMAINING, RECEIVABLES_CHARGES_CHARGED , FREIGHT_ORIGINAL, FREIGHT_REMAINING, TAX_ORIGINAL, TAX_REMAINING, EXCHANGE_RATE_TYPE, EXCHANGE_DATE, EXCHANGE_RATE, TRX_NUMBER, TRX_DATE, GL_DATE, ACCTD_AMOUNT_DUE_REMAINING, PROGRAM_APPLICATION_ID, PROGRAM_ID, PROGRAM_UPDATE_DATE, REQUEST_ID, ORG_ID, COLLECTOR_LAST, DISCOUNT_DATE, TO_CHAR(due_date) AS due_date_string, ou_ledger.LEDGER_ID L_LEDGER_ID, ou_ledger.CHART_OF_ACCOUNTS_ID L_CHART_OF_ACCOUNTS_ID, ou_ledger.ACCOUNTED_PERIOD_TYPE L_PERIOD_TYPE, ou_ledger.PERIOD_SET_NAME L_PERIOD_SET_NAME FROM AR_PAYMENT_SCHEDULES_ALL INNER JOIN ou_ledger ON AR_PAYMENT_SCHEDULES_ALL.ORG_ID = ou_ledger.ORGANIZATION_ID where LAST_UPDATE_DATE > ?

sql.query: SELECT CUST_ACCOUNT_ID,PARTY_ID, ORG_ID, ACCOUNT_NAME , ACCOUNT_NUMBER, STATUS, DEPARTMENT, CUSTOMER_TYPE, CUSTOMER_CLASS_CODE, CURRENT_BALANCE,HIGH_PRIORITY_INDICATOR, ACCOUNT_ACTIVATION_DATE, HIGH_PRIORITY_REMARKS,SUSPENSION_DATE, WRITE_OFF_PAYMENT_AMOUNT ,WRITE_OFF_AMOUNT, COMPETITOR_TYPE, COMMENTS, DATES_NEGATIVE_TOLERANCE, DATES_POSITIVE_TOLERANCE, CREATION_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_DATE FROM HZ_CUST_ACCOUNTS

SELECT PARTY_ID, PARTY_NUMBER, PARTY_NAME, PARTY_TYPE, GROUP_TYPE, PERSON_FIRST_NAME, PERSON_MIDDLE_NAME, PERSON_LAST_NAME, CITY, COUNTY, POSTAL_CODE,STATE,PROVINCE,STATUS,COUNTRY,SIC_CODE_TYPE,TOTAL_NUM_OF_ORDERS,TOTAL_ORDERED_AMOUNT,LAST_ORDERED_DATE,EMPLOYEES_TOTAL,CATEGORY_CODE,COMPETITOR_FLAG,CREATION_DATE,LAST_UPDATE_DATE from HZ_PARTIES

select RCTLG.CUSTOMER_TRX_LINE_ID, RCTLG.CUST_TRX_LINE_GL_DIST_ID, RCTLG.MRC_CUSTOMER_TRX_ID, RCTLG.CUSTOMER_TRX_ID, RCTLG.CODE_COMBINATION_ID, RCTLG.SET_OF_BOOKS_ID, GSB.PERIOD_SET_NAME, GSB.ACCOUNTED_PERIOD_TYPE, RCTLG.LAST_UPDATED_BY, RCTLG.CREATION_DATE, RCTLG.CREATED_BY, RCTLG.LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN, RCTLG.PERCENT, RCTLG.AMOUNT, RCTLG.GL_DATE, RCTLG.GL_POSTED_DATE , RCTLG.CUST_TRX_LINE_SALESREP_ID, RCTLG.COMMENTS, RCTLG.ORIGINAL_GL_DATE, RCTLG.POSTING_CONTROL_ID, RCTLG.ACCOUNT_CLASS , RCTLG.ACCOUNT_SET_FLAG, RCTLG.ACCTD_AMOUNT, RCTLG.LATEST_REC_FLAG, RCTLG.ORG_ID from RA_CUST_TRX_LINE_GL_DIST_ALL RCTLG, GL_SETS_OF_BOOKS GSB WHERE RCTLG.SET_OF_BOOKS_ID = GSB.SET_OF_BOOKS_ID

SELECT CUST_ACCOUNT_ID,PARTY_ID, ORG_ID, ACCOUNT_NAME , ACCOUNT_NUMBER, STATUS, DEPARTMENT, CUSTOMER_TYPE, CUSTOMER_CLASS_CODE, CURRENT_BALANCE,HIGH_PRIORITY_INDICATOR, ACCOUNT_ACTIVATION_DATE, HIGH_PRIORITY_REMARKS,SUSPENSION_DATE, WRITE_OFF_PAYMENT_AMOUNT ,WRITE_OFF_AMOUNT, COMPETITOR_TYPE, COMMENTS, DATES_NEGATIVE_TOLERANCE, DATES_POSITIVE_TOLERANCE, CREATION_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_DATE FROM HZ_CUST_ACCOUNTS

SELECT PARTY_ID, PARTY_NUMBER, PARTY_NAME, PARTY_TYPE, GROUP_TYPE, PERSON_FIRST_NAME, PERSON_MIDDLE_NAME, PERSON_LAST_NAME, CITY, COUNTY, POSTAL_CODE,STATE,PROVINCE,STATUS,COUNTRY,SIC_CODE_TYPE,TOTAL_NUM_OF_ORDERS,TOTAL_ORDERED_AMOUNT,LAST_ORDERED_DATE,EMPLOYEES_TOTAL,CATEGORY_CODE,COMPETITOR_FLAG,CREATION_DATE,LAST_UPDATE_DATE from HZ_PARTIES

SELECT PARTY_ID, PARTY_NUMBER, PARTY_NAME, PARTY_TYPE, GROUP_TYPE, PERSON_FIRST_NAME, PERSON_MIDDLE_NAME, PERSON_LAST_NAME, CITY, COUNTY, POSTAL_CODE,STATE,PROVINCE,STATUS,COUNTRY,SIC_CODE_TYPE,TOTAL_NUM_OF_ORDERS,TOTAL_ORDERED_AMOUNT,LAST_ORDERED_DATE,EMPLOYEES_TOTAL,CATEGORY_CODE,COMPETITOR_FLAG,CREATION_DATE,LAST_UPDATE_DATE from HZ_PARTIES
SELECT PAYMENT_SCHEDULE_ID, SOURCE_TYPE, PARENT_REQUEST_ID, WORKER_ID FROM AR.AR_AGING_PAYMENT_SCHEDULES

SELECT "FLEX_VALUE_SET_ID" FLEX_VALUE_SET_ID, "PARENT_FLEX_VALUE" PARENT_FLEX_VALUE, "CHILD_FLEX_VALUE" CHILD_FLEX_VALUE, "SUMMARY_FLAG" SUMMARY_FLAG, "CREATED_BY" CREATED_BY, "CREATION_DATE" CREATION_DATE, "LAST_UPDATED_BY" LAST_UPDATED_BY, "LAST_UPDATE_DATE" LAST_UPDATE_DATE, "LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN" LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN, "STATUS_CODE" STATUS_CODE FROM "GL"."GL_SEG_VAL_HIERARCHIES"

SELECT "FLEX_VALUE_SET_ID" FLEX_VALUE_SET_ID, "PARENT_FLEX_VALUE" PARENT_FLEX_VALUE, "CHILD_FLEX_VALUE" CHILD_FLEX_VALUE, "SUMMARY_FLAG" SUMMARY_FLAG, "LAST_UPDATED_BY" LAST_UPDATED_BY, "LAST_UPDATE_DATE" LAST_UPDATE_DATE, "LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN" LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN, "CREATED_BY" CREATED_BY, "CREATION_DATE" CREATION_DATE, "STATUS_CODE" STATUS_CODE FROM "GL"."GL_SEG_VAL_NORM_HIERARCHY"

SELECT CT.CUSTOMER_TRX_ID ,CT.ORG_ID ,CT.BILL_TO_ADDRESS_ID,CT.SHIP_TO_ADDRESS_ID ,CT.CUST_TRX_TYPE_ID,CT.SET_OF_BOOKS_ID, GSB.PERIOD_SET_NAME, GSB.ACCOUNTED_PERIOD_TYPE, CT.BILL_TO_CONTACT_ID, CT.BATCH_ID ,CT.BATCH_SOURCE_ID,CT.TRX_NUMBER,CT.REASON_CODE ,CT.SOLD_TO_CUSTOMER_ID, CT.SOLD_TO_CONTACT_ID ,CT.SOLD_TO_SITE_USE_ID, CT.BILL_TO_CUSTOMER_ID, CT.BILL_TO_SITE_USE_ID, CT.SHIP_TO_CUSTOMER_ID, CT.SHIP_TO_CONTACT_ID, CT.SHIP_TO_SITE_USE_ID, CT.PRIMARY_SALESREP_ID, CT.TERM_ID , CT.TERM_DUE_DATE, CT.TRX_DATE, CT.PURCHASE_ORDER, CT.PURCHASE_ORDER_DATE ,CT.INTERNAL_NOTES ,CT.INVOICE_CURRENCY_CODE , CT.CREATION_DATE ,CT.LAST_UPDATE_DATE FROM RA_CUSTOMER_TRX_ALL CT, GL_SETS_OF_BOOKS GSB WHERE CT.SET_OF_BOOKS_ID=GSB.SET_OF_BOOKS_ID
sql.queryUpdate: SELECT CT.CUSTOMER_TRX_ID ,CT.ORG_ID ,CT.BILL_TO_ADDRESS_ID,CT.SHIP_TO_ADDRESS_ID ,CT.CUST_TRX_TYPE_ID,CT.SET_OF_BOOKS_ID, GSB.PERIOD_SET_NAME, GSB.ACCOUNTED_PERIOD_TYPE, CT.BILL_TO_CONTACT_ID, CT.BATCH_ID ,CT.BATCH_SOURCE_ID,CT.TRX_NUMBER,CT.REASON_CODE ,CT.SOLD_TO_CUSTOMER_ID, CT.SOLD_TO_CONTACT_ID ,CT.SOLD_TO_SITE_USE_ID, CT.BILL_TO_CUSTOMER_ID, CT.BILL_TO_SITE_USE_ID, CT.SHIP_TO_CUSTOMER_ID, CT.SHIP_TO_CONTACT_ID, CT.SHIP_TO_SITE_USE_ID, CT.PRIMARY_SALESREP_ID, CT.TERM_ID , CT.TERM_DUE_DATE, CT.TRX_DATE, CT.PURCHASE_ORDER, CT.PURCHASE_ORDER_DATE ,CT.INTERNAL_NOTES ,CT.INVOICE_CURRENCY_CODE , CT.CREATION_DATE ,CT.LAST_UPDATE_DATE FROM RA_CUSTOMER_TRX_ALL CT, GL_SETS_OF_BOOKS GSB WHERE CT.SET_OF_BOOKS_ID=GSB.SET_OF_BOOKS_ID AND CT.LAST_UPDATE_DATE > ?

sql.query: select CTL.*, (select sum(co.cmpnt_cost) from APPS.CM_CMPT_DTL_VW co where co.inventory_item_id = ctl.inventory_item_id and co.organization_id = 1381 and co.period_id in (select cldr.period_id from APPS.CM_CLDR_MST_V cldr where cldr.calendar_code = '06LA' and trx.trx_date >= cldr.start_date and trx.trx_date < cldr.end_date ) group by co.organization_id , co.inventory_item_id ) costV FROM RA_CUSTOMER_TRX_LINES_ALL CTL, RA_CUSTOMER_TRX_ALL TRX WHERE TRX.CUSTOMER_TRX_ID = CTL.CUSTOMER_TRX_ID
sql.queryUpdate: select CTL.*, (select sum(co.cmpnt_cost) from APPS.CM_CMPT_DTL_VW co where co.inventory_item_id = ctl.inventory_item_id and co.organization_id = 1381 and co.period_id in (select cldr.period_id from APPS.CM_CLDR_MST_V cldr where cldr.calendar_code = '06LA' and trx.trx_date >= cldr.start_date and trx.trx_date < cldr.end_date ) group by co.organization_id , co.inventory_item_id ) costV FROM RA_CUSTOMER_TRX_LINES_ALL CTL, RA_CUSTOMER_TRX_ALL TRX WHERE TRX.CUSTOMER_TRX_ID = CTL.CUSTOMER_TRX_ID AND CTL.LAST_UPDATE_DATE > ?
